verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] announce his decision on the 2015 Iran nuclear deal on May 8 , 2018 amid speculation that he will pull the US from the agreement , despite pleas from his European allies .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: announce] [ARG1: his decision on the 2015 Iran nuclear deal] [ARGM-TMP: on May 8 , 2018] [ARGM-LOC: amid speculation that he will pull the US from the agreement , despite pleas from his European allies] .

President Donald Trump will announce his decision on the 2015 Iran nuclear deal on May 8 , 2018 amid speculation that he [V: will] pull the US from the agreement , despite pleas from his European allies .

President Donald Trump will announce his decision on the 2015 Iran nuclear deal on May 8 , 2018 amid speculation that [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: pull] [ARG1: the US] [ARG2: from the agreement] , [ARGM-ADV: despite pleas from his European allies] .
